title: RBI Monetary Policy: Central bank keeps real GDP growth projection unchanged at 6.5% for FY26
description:
RBI MPC Meeting: The Reserve Bank of India, in its second monetary policy meeting of the financial year 2025-26 (FY26), Friday, June 6, kept the real GDP growth forecast unchanged at 6.5% for FY26.

While domestic economic activity has shown resilience so far this year, the RBI, under Governor Sanja...
